channel.title: Simple easy question: EVERY Npc drops (trisidiax sources) what files? click plz
channel.description:
1 995 9 995 (NPCDROPS.CFG) thats an example of 1 i JUST WANT TO MAKE SURE!
1 = npc id (man) and 995 = coins right??
i dont know if my server (trisidiax source) u can edit like percant drop rates if it can tell me what file :D
oh and i want to edit like npc's such as tormented demons but i cant seem to fine the 14484 (dlcaws they drop) i also want to edit jad make him drop another 2 items or so....
what file are these. thanks, please post positive helping stuff.

Look in there and hopefully u will see what to do.
